item.description: New Members Welcome - we are an SATB chorus and will rehearse every Monday eve 7-8:30 October 15 through to our Christmas Concert in mid-December. All music is sung in the Italian language. For any questions, contact Kellie Gutman, Chorus Manager, at kellieogutman@gmail.com. For more info see http://www.dantemass.org/html/coro-dante.html. Wine and refreshments served after rehearsals. The Coro is an open and welcoming, Very friendly, social group that shares the common interest of choral music and the Italian language. It is a mix of native and non-native speakers.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Lunedì Italiano

item.name: FIRST REHEARSAL FOR CHRISTMAS CONCERT - CORO-DANTE
